title: A Steampunk Guide to Tea Dueling
description: TEA DUELING is a parlor game of cunning and concentration in which two combatants square off armed only with tea and biscuits. It requires a quick wit and a steady hand. The rules are simple, but the techniques and strategies are as varied and unique as the combatants themselves. You will learn the fine art of the duel from world renowned champions of this steampunk pastime. Included are 40 alternative and additional rules to add even more fun and excitement to your matches. Also over 30 tips, tricks, and pro techniques to insure your victory against any opponent. As well as frabjous recipes from Alice and the Cheshire Cat for food, drinks, and treats to make your tea party the maddest in Wonderland! Ready! Set! Duel!VISIT AND ORDER THROUGH teadueling.comThe author makes more $$ that way!
author: Khurt Khave
